controller

Class GameFieldFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GameFieldFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameFieldFactory

    public class GameFieldFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGameFieldFactory
    This factory create new game fields with the start constellation. For this it use a xml where the position of each figure stand.
    Author:
    Bj√∂rn Hullmann
